about_the_game:
In the boundless deep blue, sea snakes are locked in an eternal submerged battle to claim the throne of ocean overlords.

Live your best sea snake life. Eat voraciously and elongate your body while staying safe from predators. Gobble everything you can except your own growing body.

There are many creatures in the deep to snack on, but be careful. The delicious pufferfish sometimes swells up revealing poisonous spines. If you are eaten, and reduced to a small fry, find a pearl from one of the shells on the sea floor to return to snake form.

Dragon balls occasionally appear in shells and will elevate your snake self to Dragon King of the sea, increasing speed and giving strength enough to devour dangerous hermit crabs.
detailed_description:
In the boundless deep blue, sea snakes are locked in an eternal submerged battle to claim the throne of ocean overlords.

Live your best sea snake life. Eat voraciously and elongate your body while staying safe from predators. Gobble everything you can except your own growing body.

There are many creatures in the deep to snack on, but be careful. The delicious pufferfish sometimes swells up revealing poisonous spines. If you are eaten, and reduced to a small fry, find a pearl from one of the shells on the sea floor to return to snake form.

Dragon balls occasionally appear in shells and will elevate your snake self to Dragon King of the sea, increasing speed and giving strength enough to devour dangerous hermit crabs.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mint 18 / Ubuntu 16.04.01
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD A8-5600K
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 32MB or greater graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 380 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mint 18 / Ubuntu 16.04.01
  • Processor: 3.1 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 280 or ATI Radeon HD 6630 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 380 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

name: Snake Crossing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® XP or higher
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 3 or higher
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 32MB or greater graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 380 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® XP or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or higher
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 280 or ATI Radeon HD 6630 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 380 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound

short_description: Classic snake game with modern rules and infinite exciting. Play alone or with friends to fight against AI. The classic snake game reimagined with modern rules for infinite excitement. Battle the AI alone or with friends to become ruler of the seas.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
